title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.24 - Maintenance to be licensed activity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.24 - Maintenance to be licensed activity

State Regulations

No person, firm, partnership, corporation, joint venture, association or organization shall engage in the business of repairing or
maintaining games of chance equipment or paraphernalia without having first
obtained a games of chance supplier's license therefor from the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4607.24

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
